item.title: The Search for a Covid-19 Treatment

item.content:encoded:
In Barron's Streetwise, a new weekly podcast from Barron's, Jack Hough talks with business leaders, influencers, market experts -- to provide insights and context around trends we should be watching. In the first episode, Jack interviews Leonard Schleifer, CEO of biotech company Regeneron, who says we could have a treatment for Covid-19 "quickly." Watch this feed for the full episode in the days ahead.
